title: Enhancing Action and Ingredient Modeling for Semantically Grounded Recipe Generation
what_happened: arXiv:2602.15862v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: Recent advances in Multimodal Large Language Models (MLMMs) have enabled recipe generation from food images, yet outputs often contain semantically incorrect actions or ingredients despite high lexical scores (e.g., BLEU, ROUGE). title: 「データ不足」の壁を越える：合成ペルソナが日本のAI開発を加速
what_happened: Hugging Face Blog announced '「データ不足」の壁を越える：合成ペルソナが日本のAI開発を加速', highlighting new developments relevant to AI researchers and practitioners.

title: Code Metal Raises $125 Million to Rewrite the Defense Industry’s Code With AI
what_happened: The Boston startup uses AI to translate and verify legacy software for defense contractors, arguing modernization can’t come at the cost of new bugs.

title: Perplexity’s Retreat From Ads Signals a Bigger Strategic Shift
what_happened: The AI search startup once predicted advertising would be a massive business. Now it's betting on a smaller, more valuable audience.
